articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: This 'wandering meatloaf' chiton has a rare mineral in its teeth - CNN
articles.description: A rare iron mineral has been discovered in the teeth of a living organism for the first time -- one that bears the pet name "wandering meatloaf." They're more commonly known as chiton, a type of mollusk.
